name: Wrapping Hero(Extra Credits 2018 Holiday Jam)
description:
You play as one of the heroes of the holidays, a present wrapper. Use the 1, 2, 3, 4 keys to wrap presents as fast you can and gain points.

'Wrapping Hero' a holiday themed game made for Extra Credits 2018 Holiday Jam over ~48 hours. Game was programmed in C using my own engine, other tools/resources used:

FL Studio

Paint.NET

SDL
